Token.Abstract: Allows custom processing of the SPC license request and the license response
Allows a custom CID to be used with the SDK default AVAssetResourceLoaderDelegate

Parameter.Name: asset
Parameter.Abstract: The VirtuosoAsset the licensing request is for

Parameter.Name: fpRequest
Parameter.Abstract: The URL provided to the AVAssetResourceLoaderDelegate for the licensing request

ReturnValue.Abstract: The CID value to use during SPC creation

Token.Abstract: Allows custom processing of the FairPlay POST body before it is send.

Parameter.Name: asset
Parameter.Abstract: The VirtuosoAsset the licensing request is for

ReturnValue.Abstract: An NSData object suitable for the license server POST body

Token.Abstract: Allows custom processing of the FairPlay license server response

Parameter.Name: asset
Parameter.Abstract: The VirtuosoAsset the licensing request is for

Parameter.Name: response
Parameter.Abstract: The received response from the license server

ReturnValue.Abstract: CKC data value suitable for handing to the player for DRM licensing
